snippet: Grammy officials say he will appear in the same show with Rihanna, a former girlfriend who Mr. Brown admitted having assaulted at a party before the Grammy Awards three years ago.
abstract: Grammy officials say he will appear in the same show with Rihanna, a former girlfriend who Mr. Brown admitted having assaulted at a party before the Grammy Awards three years ago.
lead_paragraph: It has been three years since the R&B singer Chris Brown admitted he had assaulted his then-girlfriend, the pop star Rihanna, at a party before the Grammy Awards. The attack led to a felony conviction, a sentence of five years probation and a flood of tabloid headlines.

headline.main: Chris Brown to Perform at the Grammys
